review_blob: IPA is not the first association when drinking this beer; lager might as well qualify in the deScription. But that doesnt really matter: I really liked this beer.
beer_name: Greene King Double Hop Monster (Bottle / Keg)

review_blob: The high bitterness is refeshing, but the fruit-like taste seems forgotten. Requires a bite if bread.
A beer with coffee? -At first I thought it was too contrived, but I had to give in: It is a great beer.
beer_name: Mikkeller Koppi Coffee IPA Citra & Michiti

review_blob: The taste is OK; but there is too little of it. The beer seems to ask for more hops, but was deprived from it.
